title: Deprecating constants for Media Player
description: As of Home Assistant Core 2022.5, the feature flag constants used in MediaPlayerEntity were deprecated and replaced by the MediaPlayerEntityFeature enum. Later, in 2022.10, the repeat mode, media type, and media class constants were deprecated and replaced by RepeatMode, MediaType, and MediaClass, respectively.

prevItem.title: Enforce SourceType and add shorthand attributes and EntityDescription to device_tracker
